name: Twin-Headed Dragon
text:
Flying
Your may spend will to play this card's Awakening costs as though this card were an Ancient Magic.
Awakening R: When this card enters your field ⇒ It deals 1000 damage to target resonator.
Awakening U: When this card enters your field ⇒ Rest up to two target resonators. They don't recover during their controller's next recovery phase.
